code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./Navigation.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Pokemon Gallery"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/'?'active':''),children:"List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/gallery",className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname==='/gallery'?'active':''),children:"Gallery"})]})]})});};export default Navigation;
